remarks: The restriction of an absolute value to a subring is an absolute value. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
abvres.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvres.s $e |- S = ( R |`s C ) $.
abvres.b $e |- B = ( AbsVal ` S ) $.
abvres $p |- ( ( F e. A /\ C e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( F |` C ) e. B ) $.
